messages.message: Can we add an easier way to see the logged in username/email? We had the email in the landing page settings dropdown in one of the earlier designs, which was later moved to the project nav and then removed. I think now there is no way to see the full email/username.
Hrm, what if you click on Settings which takes you to the Account page?
Oh it is mentioned there actually, thanks! Never saw that. It should be good then
